name: Aliens
startIntroPart2: This is an overpowered joke nation just as an example for the mods feature. Set Phasers to Obliterate!!
declaringWar: Resistance is futile! Prepare to be assimilated!
attacked: You want to play? Very funny!
defeated: How is it possible that those Apes hurt us? The galactic senate will take care of them.
introduction: As superior galactic entities, you are not worthy of our attention.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.

name: Katipunan
startIntroPart1: Mabuhay Supremo Bonifacio, Father of the Philippine Revolution. For centuries the Spaniards colonized the Filipino people and other colonial powers would continue to do so even after your revolt.
startIntroPart2: However, the Philippine hope still resides in you and your Katipuneros. Will you be able to achieve a free Nation in this unfamiliar world?
declaringWar: You are a threat to our people, prepare to die!
attacked: It was only a matter of time, greed truly is universal
introduction: Pagbati sayo estranghero. Respect our free nation and we'll respect you.
afterPeace: Sa wakas, natapos na uli ang paglalaban.
tradeRequest: We have an offer for you. presyong suki na yan!
